reasoning: PML is extremely rare in general population (<0.1 per 100k), occurring primarily in immunocompromised patients. In HIV+ populations circa 2005, incidence ~0.5-1 per 100k HIV+ persons.
source: Engsig FN et al. (2009). Incidence, clinical presentation, and outcome of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy in HIV-infected patients during the highly active antiretroviral therapy era. J Infect Dis. 199(1):77-83
